You can contact me here.

That is all there is to do here.*

*Unless you want to print this page & cut out the picture of me along the dotted line. Once you have successfully cut out my picture, use an adhesive to affix my picture to your forehead. Walk around imitating my mannerisms & talking about subjects I usually talk about. Once the adhesive has worn off & the picture has fallen from your forehead, return to behaving in your usual way. Try supplying a group of friends w/ their own pictures of me, and, having instructed them on their use, all affix your Clayton pictures to your foreheads together!
